Lab.Description: In this lab you will handle the process life-time management events in a Metro style app. You will save data in the suspending event, and restore it in the launching event so that the users have a seamless experience as the app’s lifetime is managed by the OS.
Lab.Title: Lifetime management: saving and restoring state
